sentences.en: Also under construction is " Atlanta Heritage Row ", a 4,000 - square - foot pavilion about the city's past.
sentences.cn: 正在兴建的还有 “ 亚特兰大发展史展览长廊 ”, 这是占地四千平方英尺的关于该市历史的展览馆.

sentences.en: beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage
sentences.cn: 属于我们遗产一部分的漂亮古建筑

sentences.en: Held above the provincial level key cultural heritage unIt'staff training.

sentences.en: Heritage City 3: College Hill are, courtyard Wang, Yixian Bridge.
sentences.cn: 市文物保护3处: 皆山书院 、 王家庭院 、 逸仙桥.

sentences.en: I have not punctuated every fact or example with its academic heritage.
sentences.cn: 我对每个事实和例证并不学究式地强调其出自何处.

sentences.en: In 1986, the landing point is listed as heritage unit of Zhuhai.
sentences.cn: 1986年, 该登陆点被列为珠海市文物保护单位.

sentences.en: Mr. Tung lives up to his distinguished heritage - a man of both literary and military talents. "
sentences.cn: 董先生不愧家学渊源,更难得是文武全才. ”

sentences.en: No human dwelling should have a richer heritage than Number Ten Downing Street.
sentences.cn: 任何房间都不能象唐宁街十号那样有着丰富的内容.

sentences.en: Palace has released two marvellous films that pay homage to our literary heritage.
sentences.cn: 皇宫影业公司发行了两部颂扬我们文学遗产的精彩影片。

sentences.en: Telling conservationists that we need to preserve the natural heritage really is preaching to the converted!
sentences.cn: 向自然资源保护论者宣讲需要保护自然界遗产的道理,真是多此一举.

sentences.en: The ancient buildings are part of the national heritage.
sentences.cn: 这些古建筑是民族遗产的一部分.

sentences.en: the importance of preserving the national heritage
sentences.cn: 保护民族遗产的重要性

sentences.en: The library is unique and its break-up would be a sad reflection on the value we place on our heritage.
sentences.cn: 这个图书馆很特别，若将它关闭，会让人怀疑我们是否珍视传统。

sentences.en: The museum collection vividly portrays the heritage of 200 years of canals.
sentences.cn: 博物馆的藏品让运河200年的历史再现眼前.

sentences.en: These ancient buildings are part of the national heritage.
sentences.cn: 这些古建是民族遗产的一部分.

sentences.en: They take great pride in their heritage.
sentences.cn: 他们为自己的历史传统深感自豪。

sentences.en: We must take care to preserve our national heritage.
sentences.cn: 我们必须注意保护自己的民族遗产.
